param.name: resource
param.label: Workflow simulation host (cluster name)
param.help: Cluster to run simulation. Select a resource from drop down menu.

param.name: runscript
param.label: Run script
param.help: Name of the script to run from inside the repository directory after setup.

param.name: cores_per_worker
param.label: Cores per Worker
param.help: cores_per_worker parameter for the Parsl HighThroughputExecutor

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue
param.help: Job will submitted using SSH, sbatch or qsub, respectively

param.name: _parsl_provider_partition
param.label: SLURM Partition
param.help: partition parameter for the Parsl SlurmProvider

param.name: _parsl_provider_nodes_per_block
param.label: Nodes per Block
param.help: nodes_per_block parameter for the Parsl SlurmProvider

param.name: _parsl_provider_cores_per_node
param.label: Cores per Node
param.help: cores_per_node parameter for the Parsl SlurmProvider

param.name: _parsl_provider_exclusive
param.label: Exclusive node use
param.help: Select Yes to request exclusive nodes; Parsl SlurmProvider.

param.name: _parsl_provider_walltime
param.label: Walltime
param.help: walltime parameter for the Parsl SlurmProvider

param.name: _parsl_provider_max_blocks
param.label: Max Blocks
param.help: max_blocks parameter for the Parsl SlurmProvider

param.name: _sch__d_q___
param.label: PBS queue
param.help: Queue to submit the interactive job. Must select one! Use [qstat -f -Q] to list all queues on the system

param.name: scheduler_directives
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. -l mem=1000;-l nodes=1:ppn=4 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the PB S keyword.
